name: Unbound Saga
description:
Climb through the panels and fight hand drawn enemies as you uncover the twisted comic book tale of Rick Ajax and Lori Machete -- two heroes with their own fighting style and unique set of skills. As you journey through the futuristic wastelands of Toxopolis in search of your nemesis - The Maker - you will encounter a wide range of bizarre creatures, colorful characters, and brutal bosses, most of whom will try their best to prevent you from reaching your goal.
• Tag Team Heroes - Strategically switch between two main characters, Rick Ajax and Lori Machete, each with their own unique fighting styles and special unlockable skills.
• Interactive Environments - Real-time physics allow you to smash anything in the room! If you can pick it up, you can use it as a weapon!
• Character Advancement - Collect Upgrade Tokens and customize your Heroes’ abilities with unique, unlockable Skills and Powers. The better you play, the more Tokens you earn, and the more cool moves you can unlock!
